name: Artistic photo session
description: Do you want to have the most beautiful and personal souvenir of your stay in this wonderful city? I am offering you this possibility - we will visit one of the most inconic places in Paris and I'll take care of the most beautiful and original photo that you can get from there. Do you want some romantic pictures with Notre-Dame, on family souvenir with all the members on the picture? Or do you just want to have fun?
